content.en: Cellular image analysis: Scientists are exploring the use of algorithms to automate the analysis of individual cells in live-cell imaging experiments. These algorithms, such as deep convolutional neural networks and deep learning approaches, can accurately segment cells in microscopy images and automate cell boundary and nuclear segmentation. They are also being used to improve cell segmentation in microscopy images, count and detect cells, and segment sub-micro scale cell features. These advancements in algorithmic analysis have the potential to greatly enhance our understanding of cellular biology.
content.da: Cellebilledanalyse: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at automatisere analysen af individuelle celler i levende-celle billeddannelseseksperimenter. Disse algoritmer, såsom dybe konvolutionsneuronale netværk og dyb læringsmetoder, kan nøjagtigt segmentere celler i mikroskopibilleder og automatisere cellegrænser og nuklear segmentering. De bruges også til at forbedre celle-segmentering i mikroskopibilleder, tælle og detektere celler samt segmentere del-mikroskopiske cellefunktioner. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk analyse har potentiale til at forbedre vores forståelse af cellulær biologi betydeligt.
